title.narrative: Safe drinking water for school children and their communities

description.narrative: "The main goal of this project is to improve access to safe drinking water in Meatu district for school children and the communities they belong to. The project deliberately addresses school children directly as well as the communities they belong to. If targeting school children in isolation, the project’s impact would still be compromised by the lack of access to safe drinking water in the children’s household environment." With the current approach the project attempts to maximize its impact for rural communities in Meatu in general and their children in specific. 1000 households in remote areas that cannot be served through community water systems will have access to purification products that ensure safe drinking water.
